This is a huge advantage for businesses that are always at risk of cyber-attacks.Another reason we think cryptocurrency is the way of the future is because of its speed and efficiency. Traditional payment methods, such as credit cards, can take days or even weeks to process a transaction. With cryptocurrency, payments can be processed in just seconds. This efficiency is critical for businesses that need to move quickly.Finally, we believe that over time, cryptocurrency will become more popular and more people will start using it. We are already seeing big companies like microsoft or Shopify start accepting bitcoin as payment, and this trend will continue. As more people become familiar with cryptocurrency and how it works, they are more likely to use it themselves as consumers and businesses.So if you're not already aware of the cryptocurrency revolution, we encourage you to pay attention! comments.body: Enterprises often experience difficulties with international payments, which in turn, complicates some business processes.One of the main problems of international payments is currency fluctuations. Exchange rates can change quickly and unexpectedly, which means that by the time a payment arrives at its destination, its value may be lower than expected. To mitigate this risk, it is essential to keep an eye on exchange rates and, if possible, use forward contracts or options to lock in an exchange rate for future payments.When transferring cryptocurrency with Passimpay, the exchange rate is fixed. The funds are transferred instantly from account to account.Another problem is the hidden fees and commissions associated with international payments. Banks often charge hefty fees for processing foreign transactions, which can quickly increase if you make frequent payments.At Passimpay, the withdrawal fee for companies is floating but never exceeds 3.5%.Make profitable payments and transfers worldwide, instantly and securely
